name: Three Short Days
description:
Description

Three Short Days is a stealth puzzle game set in a decrepit demon mansion. Explore the expansive manor, rescue a kingdom of servants, and race the clock. Can you rescue all 150 citizens before the dinner of Day 3? Challenge the clock today!

Features:

  • Expansive setting with tonnes to explore
  • 150 citizens to rescue 
  •  25+ puzzle rooms scattered across the mansion 
  •  Short but sweet narrative elements 
  •  Stealth mechanics to evade enemy sight

Created by Cooper Watson
Screen Name:  Not_so_Psycho
